item.description: Cliff Rescue - Vehicle; INC#1436; 08:30PM; 7751 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3suYaeG; Hollywood Hills West; (Incident type updates to a Cliff Rescue) Firefighters transported lifting and extrication equipment down the cliffside via the two-line rope system and conducted the extrication operation. LAFD Air Ops is conducting a hoist operation to bring the patient up and then provide air transport to the hospital. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E278 E482 E76 E86 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HR3 RA27 RA827 RA86 RA97 RH114 T27 T78 UR27 UR88; CH8; 15 18; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue; INC#1436; 07:44PM; 7751 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3suYaeG; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters located a vehicle located down the hillside with one patient in critical condition and requiring extrication (situation is being assessed). Firefighters are establishing a two-line rope system to safely descend and further assess the needs including the best method of bringing the patient topside for transport to the hospital. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:57PM.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E278 E482 E76 E86 EM14 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 HR3 RA86 RA97 RH114 T78 UR88; CH8; 15; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Contained; INC#1430; 07:18PM; 12665 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qkYoUx; Sylmar; All forward progress of the fire is stopped and what was believed to be a spot fire across the freeway was smoke from heavy equipment. Firefighters will be conducting mop up operations to address any remaining hot spots. No injuries reported and no structures damaged. No further updates.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E24 E275 E298 E7 E77 E89 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA98 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1430; 06:52PM; 12665 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qkYoUx; Sylmar; Approximately small (30' x 30') spot fire on the side of the NB210 and a 2nd spot fire across the freeway (in LA County jurisdiction). Wind conditions are moderate with 10-15mph winds. LA County Fire is also enroute with a full brush response.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E24 E275 E298 E7 E77 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA98 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Strike Team Deployment - Coastal Fire 05/11/2022 INC#1383

item.description: Strike Team Deployment - Coastal Fire; INC#1383; 06:23PM; 450 E Temple St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DxioYT; Downtown; LAFD Strike Team 1001, comprising five engines and a battalion chief, are responding to a mutual aid request by Orange County Fire Authority to assist at the #CoastalFire Please follow @OCFireAuthority on Twitter for all incident updates. ; E10, E20, E21, E29, E33, PB4; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Grass Fire; INC#0714; 01:47PM; 2821 E 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ldm5Gk; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 49 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was held to approximately one acre with no structures damaged. Crews will remain in the area conducting mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. Traffic may be impacted for an unknown duration. Please follow CHP channels for freeway updates. No further details. ; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC13 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E2 E20 E202 E203 E21 E25 E3 E4 E9 H4 HA4 T2 T3 WT77; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Rubbish Fire; INC#0714; 11:58AM; 2821 E 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ldm5Gk; Boyle Heights; Firefighters are on scene with approximately 1/2 acre of grass and trees. Crews are working to prevent the embers from starting spot fires across the lanes of traffic. CHP will be shutting down the WB60 x Euclid due to emergency operations. Drivers are recommended to avoid this section of highway and follow https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for updates. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 11:58AM. ; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E14 E2 E202 E203 E25 E3 E4 T2 T3; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0194; 05:06AM; 5020 W Obama Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w1Wsn6; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 66 firefighters extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the attic. The fire was contained primarily to the unit of origin with two additional units sustaining minor extension inside (from the fire on the exterior) and one with damage only to the exterior. Red Cross requested to assist displaced (number unknown) residents. LAFD Arson is enroute for the investigation. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM22 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E266 E27 E294 E34 E43 E58 E94 EA1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA827 RA894 RA94 T26 T27 T29 T61 T66 T94 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0194; 04:57AM; 5020 W Obama Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w1Wsn6; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; Two story, garden-style apartment building with fire showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and are battling heavy fire in at least two units. Additional resources are enroute. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 4:36AM. ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 BC4 BC5 CM22 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E266 E27 E294 E34 E43 E58 E94 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA27 RA827 RA894 RA94 T26 T27 T29 T61 T66 T94 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 05/10/2022 INC#1835

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1835; 12:49AM; 6421 N Independence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N6y75w; #WoodlandHills; It took 74 firefighters 69 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM22 CM42 E104 E106 E27 E273 E287 E289 E290 E305 E72 E75 E84 E93 EA1 EM17 HR3 RA105 RA72 RA84 T105 T73 T87 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH8; 14 18; Nicholas Prange
